verses.name: Matthew 10:37
verses.text: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me: and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me.

verses.name: Matthew 10:38
verses.text: And he that taketh not his cross, and followeth after me, is not worthy of me.

verses.name: Matthew 10:39
verses.text: He that findeth his life shall lose it: and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it.

verses.name: Matthew 10:40
verses.text: He that receiveth you receiveth me, and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me.
